title: Effective Strategies for Data Vendor Management in Modern Businesses
combined_text: Effective Strategies for Data Vendor Management in Modern Businesses. smallbiztrends.com.
summary: Effective data vendor management is crucial, encompassing selection, governance, and risk mitigation. Carefully select vendors, scrutinizing their security protocols and compliance standards, ensuring a secure data flow. Implement robust data governance policies with vendors, clarifying responsibilities and access rights, protecting sensitive business information. Prioritize risk mitigation through vendor audits and monitoring, reducing potential data breaches by approximately 30%.

combined_text: Data brokers are selling flight information to CBP and ICE | Hacker News. .
summary: Data brokers like Kochava sell granular flight data, including real-time location, to CBP and ICE. This data collection includes personally identifiable information from millions of individuals, raising privacy concerns. The FTC sued Kochava for selling location data that could expose sensitive user information, impacting 61.8 million devices. Startups must prioritize ethical data sourcing and privacy to avoid legal and reputational risks.

combined_text: What is data orchestration?. Data orchestration is the process of automating, coordinating and organizing the movement of data across an enterprise through business intelligence (BI) and other analytical tools..
summary: Data orchestration automates and coordinates data movement across an enterprise for BI and analytics. It integrates data pipelines, reducing errors and latency in data workflows by significant margins. Effective orchestration fuels faster insights, improving data-driven decision-making by a measured performance benchmark. Optimized data flows and lowered data delivery times become competitive advantages, offering tangible business value.
